title: Gold Support LFTeam

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Janna / Thresh / Shen / Bard / Soraka / Braum /  Nautilius / Morgana (in that order)
Comfortable with Lane Swaps, Double Jungle, Solo invades and Morde ADC. Can Shot Call but prefer not to.
Play every day, typically morning and night. 
Can bring my duo if needed, Plat 5 ADC / Jungle / Top.

replies.body: Add me on Tealey, keen to play ranked teams!
